html.p: Given vectors [mathjaxinline]v_1, v_2, \ldots v_ n[/mathjaxinline] in a vector space [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] over a field [mathjaxinline]F[/mathjaxinline], we say that the list [mathjaxinline]\{ v_1; v_2; \ldots v_ n\}[/mathjaxinline] spans [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] if the span of the list of vectors is all of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline].
